asset.prompt: A cinematic, hyper-detailed, slightly unsettling, disorienting room where every surface—walls, floor, ceiling—is a mirror. Reflections of the viewer are everywhere, distorted at crazy angles. The lighting is bright and glaring. The style is 90s spooky, creating a confusing, dizzying, and paranoid atmosphere.
